医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
吸食高 CBD/低 THC 产品对驾驶能力的影响研究人员评估了单次或重复蒸发富含 CBD 的大麻后血液中的大麻素水平如何影响驾驶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Impact-of-vaping-high-CBDlow-THC-products-on-driven-ability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Impact-of-vaping-high-CBDlow-THC-products-on-driven-ability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=561780cf-2079-49d3-81d8-3f853f2dacaa Thu, 31 Aug 2023 09:48:00 -0400 Impact of vaping high CBD/low THC products on driving ability
研究探索机器人辅助 TMS 治疗抑郁症的潜力在《科学报告》最近发表的一项研究中，一组研究人员评估了与传统手动方法相比，用于经颅磁刺激 (TMS) 线圈放置的定制机器人系统在治疗抑郁症方面的效率、治疗效果和患者感知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-explores-the-pottial-of-robotic-assistance-TMS-for-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Study-explores-the-pottial-of-robotic-assistance-TMS-for-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07f9b48b-e06b-4b15-9ab1-d6f78af5a814 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 09:36:00 -0400 Study explores the potential of robotic-assisted TMS for depression
骑电动自行车可能会增加儿童严重受伤的风险一项研究发现，骑电动自行车的儿童比骑踏板自行车的儿童更容易受伤和住院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Electric-bicycle-riding-may-be-increasing-the-risk-of-severe-injury-in-the-pediatric-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Electric-bicycle-riding-may-be-increasing-the-risk-of-severe-injury-in-the-pediatric-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26288be5-6398-49a5-9e13-14314008638f Thu, 31 Aug 2023 08:30:00 -0400 Electric bicycle riding may be increasing the risk of severe injury in the pediatric population
新型非侵入性模型可能有助于在症状出现之前预测先兆子痫研究人员开发了一种新型临床诊断筛查测试，以识别有发生先兆子痫风险的妊娠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Novel-non-induced-model-may-help-predict-preeclampsia-before-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Novel-non-induced-model-may-help-predict-preeclampsia-before-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f035a2b1-a636-4d72-b868-77df52ba4ef4 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 08:11:00 -0400 Novel non-invasive model may help predict preeclampsia before symptoms
接受不孕症治疗与中风住院有关吗？最近发表在 JAMA Network Open 上的一篇论文试图捕捉中风与不孕不育治疗之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Is-receipt-of-infertility-treatment-linked-with-中风-hospitalization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Is-receipt-of-infertility-treatment-linked-with-中风-hospitalization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a61166f5-53e0-479f-a8df-b843f9baaeb7 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 07:59:00 -0400 Is receipt of infertility treatment associated with stroke hospitalization?
Optibrium 收购 BioPharmics LLC，扩大其 3D 药物设计和可视化产品Optibrium 是药物发现软件和人工智能解决方案的领先开发商，今天宣布收购 BioPharmics LLC。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Optibrium-acquires-BioPharmics-LLC-expanding-its-3D-drug-design-and-visualization-offering.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Optibrium-acquires-BioPharmics-LLC-expanding-its-3D-drug-design-and-visualization-offering.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0696d6f3-7ba3-442e-8e26-725c976073f8 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 07:53:00 -0400 Optibrium acquires BioPharmics LLC, expanding its 3D drug design and visualisation offering
实验室仪器制造商 Knauer 现已获得 EN ISO 13485 认证高科技实验室设备制造商KNAUER Wissenschaftliche Geräte GmbH已通过认证审核。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Laboratory-instrument-manufacturer-Knauer-is-now-EN-ISO-13485-certified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Laboratory-instrument-manufacturer-Knauer-is-now-EN-ISO-13485-certified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6256bb8d-e0ba-43be-b3b9-50ea6307eb1c Thu, 31 Aug 2023 07:48:00 -0400 Laboratory instrument manufacturer Knauer is now EN ISO 13485 certified
蒙大拿州在学校饮用水中去除铅的努力会走多远？蒙大拿州立法机构今年春天指定拨款 370 万美元，用于去除学校饮用水供应中的铅，随后该州于 8 月 1 日从旨在改善全国供水系统的 500 亿美元联邦基础设施计划中又获得了 565,000 美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/How-far-will-Montanae28099s-push-to-remove-lead-from-school-drinking-water-go.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/How-far-will-Montanae28099s-push-to-remove-lead-from-school-drinking-water-go.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f536d273-c408-449a-8b85-b165ad0f7677 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 06:31:38 -0400 How far will Montana’s push to remove lead from school drinking water go?
地中海饮食加乳制品有望降低心脏病风险一项为期 8 周的研究发现，补充乳制品的地中海饮食会改变特定的肠道细菌，并对心血管疾病高危澳大利亚人的收缩压产生积极影响。研究结果表明，这种 MedDairy 饮食可能是降低心血管风险的有效策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Mediterranean-diet-with-a-dairy-twist-shows-promise-in-lowering-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Mediterranean-diet-with-a-dairy-twist-shows-promise-in-lowering-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd948ef4-3b58-4428-a487-be21cd5cef8c Thu, 31 Aug 2023 00:24:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet with a dairy twist shows promise in lowering heart disease risk
研究称，第四种 COVID-19 加强剂可增强老年人的抗体防御能力研究发现，第四剂 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗可显着提高老年人的中和抗体水平，从而增强对 Omicron 等新 SARS-CoV-2 变种的保护。这支持了老年人群加强注射在对抗 COVID-19 方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Fourth-COVID-19-booster-supercharges-antibody-defense-in-older-adults-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230831/Fourth-COVID-19-booster-supercharges-antibody-defense-in-older-adults-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f11ab7f-0d19-43ec-84dd-28eb4449aa25 Thu, 31 Aug 2023 00:07:00 -0400 Fourth COVID-19 booster supercharges antibody defense in older adults, study says
